revised_title: The Identification and Analysis of Four Visible Ingredients in Banded Bituminous Coal
tldr: This study identifies and analyzes four distinct visible ingredients found in banded bituminous coal: fusain, vitrain, clarain, and durain. These ingredients can be separated and identified through macroscopic and microscopic examination, and their different reactions to chemical treatments indicate that they have different chemical compositions. The research provides a better understanding of the composition and structure of coal, which can be useful for the coal mining and energy industries.
